document_data.mainbody: '''Sherbet''' was a type of common and cheap drink that originated from the land of [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: Sherbet was a sweet drink made out of fruits and served chilled. It was a staple in all major cities in Zakhara, sold in shared reused [[tankard]]s by street vendors out of big cooled tanks off their backs. or as an appetizer by the caliphs of the [[Palace of Sly Ravens]]. Sherbet was also sometimes served as ice.
document_data.Availability: Sherbet was exported into [[Sembia]] and its capital of [[Selgaunt]].{{Cite dragon/304/Haunted: A Tale of Sembia|71}}
